narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: P.r.i.e. Behavioral Health, LLC is a Internal Medicine, Addiction Medicine provider based in Maricopa, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $17.1M in Medicaid payments across 43K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $17.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
